name: Cosmic Cruise
description:
Cosmic Cruise - Unity HDRP Demo Embark upon a fabulous virtual visit of a futuristic luxury cruise across space !  Controls 🎮

Keyboard and Mouse

  • [z] [s]       Move forward/backward 
  • [q] [d]      Strafe right/left
  • [Space]  Jump
  • Mouse   Orient the camera
  • [0]             Skip Intro
  • [+] [-]       Sound Volume

Recommended Specs ⚠️ Can be GPU Intensive
⚠️ Nvidia GTX 1060 or higher recommended to run smoothly Tools 🛠️
  • Unity 2022.2
  • Blender 3.1
  • Jetbrains Rider
Links 🔗

YouTube : Shader Graph Mastery
Linkedin : Nicolas Reinhard
Github :    LTMX

Context This project was made for my Technical-Art diploma exam ! Note There is no baked lighting data. Everything is real-time !
The Screen Space Global Illumination System is custom made 
(More info  at my Youtube Channel)
